stories.title: Musk invites UAW union to hold vote at Tesla California factory
Data Collection Is Hard. You Should Try It

stories.text:
Once a day? Multiple times a day, during every break, workdays only or whenever there is a good thread?

I'm still trying to find balance in checking the site but sometimes it feels like it's the same 5 posts for days and sometimes good discussions pop up multiple times a day.

I'd rather not be looking through HN 10 times a day, but missing interesting posts because of this also feels like a waste.
stories.title: Ask HN: How often do you check HN?
Evolving Curricula with Regret-Based Environment Design

stories.text: I've recently set out on my own as a freelancer / consultant specializing in knowledge graph work.  I'm good at what I do, have some pretty specialized and hard to find knowledge and so far am loving the new set of skills I need to develop and refine.  But I don't know what I don't know and think maybe a coach would be a Good Thing.  Maybe not ready for Alan Weiss himself, but somebody who can help me up my game.  Any ideas for me?  Thanks!
stories.title: Looking for a Consulting Coach
Muscles will choose the path of least resistance
